en: TPEx amended rules to strengthen duties and functions of boards
The reporting format notes of convertible bond asse swap (CBS) and RPRS of convertible bond and bond ETF (RPRS) take effect on the date of Nov. 10, 2023.
TPEx has amended its rules to enhance the quality of information disclosure for Main Board and Emerging Stock Companies
The amendments of “Taipei Exchange Rules Governing the Review of Call (Put) Warrants for Trading on the TPEx” and relevant rules will take effect on November 10, 2023.
